body: What is the whole point if prestige. Now when your level resets u can't buy anything above 1 level in neb shop. What is the point?

title: What is the Point of Prestige?

replies.body: Just to get the different stars :)

replies.body: prestige is pretty much self explanatory

replies.body:
A simple questions deserves a simple answer.
"Nothing"
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
It's a goal. Something you can strive to get. 

I, personally find It difficult to play and enjoy a game if there's no long lasting goal to it.
